DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects SSL VPN authentication and VPN access events on F5 FirePass applicances.

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.description: UserLogon: security - logged on from { to }
UserLogonFailure: security - failed to log on from
UserAuthAudit: security - User exceeded the allowed number of concurrent logons
FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) (\S+)[^[]* ([^]]+)\[\d+\]: \[([^]@]*)@?([^]]*)\] User \S+ exceeded the allowed number of concurrent logons
FastPattern.pattern: User \S+ exceeded the allowed number of concurrent logons

FastField.defaultValue: "$4" exceeded the allowed number of concurrent logons

FastPattern.description: UserAuthAudit: security - User presented with challenge
FailedAuthentication: security - Possible intrusion attempt detected against account
FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) (\S+)[^[]* ([^[]+)\[\d+\]: \[([^]@]+)@*([^]]*)\] Possible intrusion attempt detected against account (\S+) from source IP address (\S+) for URI=\[([^]]+)\]\(([^.]+)\.(.*)\)
FastPattern.pattern: Possible intrusion attempt detected against account

FastPattern.description: WebTrafficAudit: security - URL has been blocked
PolicyAccess: maintenance - Access menu, Entered, Finished using
ServiceInfo: maintenance - Uploaded scheduled backup file
ServiceWarning: maintenance - Could not create backup file
FastPattern.pattern: maintenance\[\d+\]: \[[^]]+\] Could not create backup file

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning: NetworkAccess - Error - Invalid Session ID
VPNConnection: NetworkAccess - Open Network Access Connection
FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) (\S+)[^[]* (\S+)\[\d+\]: \[([^]@]+)@*([^]]*)\] <([a-f0-9]+)> Open Network Access Connection using remote IP address (.*)

FastField.defaultValue: Open Network Access connection "$6" using remote IP "$7"

FastPattern.description: VPNConnection: NetworkAccess - Network Access Connection terminated
